story-summary.title: Build Knowledge Explorer UI Main Interface
story-summary.goal: Create the primary Knowledge Explorer interface with tab navigation, filtering system, and layout structure that allows analysts to browse and explore extracted findings from documents.

api-route-pattern.structure: - Use NextRequest/NextResponse - Create Supabase client with createClient() - Authenticate with supabase.auth.getUser() - Return 401 for unauthenticated requests - Handle errors with try/catch and proper status codes - Use audit logging for important actions

react-hook-pattern.structure: - 'use client' directive - TypeScript interfaces for options and return types - useState for data, loading, error states - useCallback for memoized functions - useEffect for initial fetch and cleanup - Optional polling support - Pagination support with loadMore

component-pattern.structure: - TypeScript interface for props - JSDoc comments with story reference - Functional component with destructured props - Use shadcn/ui components as building blocks - Handle loading/error states gracefully - Support for onClick, onAction callbacks - Accessibility: proper aria labels, keyboard support

page-structure.structure: - Server component for metadata - Client component for interactive content - Use dynamic params from route - Handle loading states with suspense

unit-testing-pattern.structure: - describe() blocks for component/feature groups - it() blocks for individual test cases - beforeEach() for setup, vi.clearAllMocks() - Mock external dependencies with vi.mock() - Use userEvent.setup() for interaction tests - Use waitFor() for async assertions - Use render() from @testing-library/react
